question: Who among the following authors wrote "Chandayan"?
explanation: Mulla Daud was the first poet in the ideology of Sufism belonged to Dalmau (Raebareli). His famous poem \"Laur Chanda\"( or Chandayan) was composed in Avadhi language in 14th century AD. Itâ€™s a love story of Norak and Chanda. He presented his work to his patron Jaunashah, who was a noble of Firoj Shah Tughlaq.
